ygData.subject: RE: Bard Instuments Wishlist
ygData.msgSnippet: Bind IN the bank!  I do when I can - that way spare drum, food and wep are all ready to go! Sylly. ... From:	Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@texas.net] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Bind IN the bank! I do when I can - that way spare drum, food and wep are
all ready to go!

Sylly.



-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 11:57 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Instuments Wishlist

From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>

It sure would be nice to have some more magic instruments in
the game. After
much consideration my Most Desired Magic Instrument (tm)
would be a regular
ol' drum...but one that sticks with you when you die. You
awaken in the
Arena, naked to the world, with 3 or so zones to
cross...wouldn't it be
wonderful to have that drum sitting there in your inventory?
No, we can't
bind, and I am happy with that, but at EXACTLY the time you
could really
leverage your abilities to lessen the pain, blah, no drum.
Sure, I keep one
in the bank for when I am bound to a city, but often zoning
to the bank to
get it is just not what I have patience for after dying...
Just a thought,
one born of making level 18 five times this weekend :o)

Tszaaz
